info.name: Strangler Fig Pattern
info.description:
## Project Structure

- **Monolith**: A Spring Boot app handling customer and order management.
    
- **Customer Microservice**: A new Spring Boot microservice for customer operations.
    
- **API Gateway**: A Spring Cloud Gateway to route requests between the monolith and microservice.

item.name: Gateway
item.description:
- http://localhost:9000/customers/1 → Routes to microservice → "Customer from Microservice: ID = 1"
    
- http://localhost:9000/orders/1 → Routes to monolith → "Order from Monolith: ID = 1"

item.name: Monolith
item.description:
- Access http://localhost:8080/customers/1 → Returns "Customer from Monolith: ID = 1"
    
- Access http://localhost:8080/orders/1 → Returns "Order from Monolith: ID = 1"

item.name: Customer_service
item.description: Access http://localhost:8081/customers/1 → Returns "Customer from Microservice: ID = 1"
